This pack has been produced to help teachers plan a class activity in the local countryside, and, with the help of practical guides, have the confidence to run their own teacher-led school visit if they choose.

The pack includes:

  • How to contact us and book a visit.
  • Details of the range of services offered
  • Information on the visitor centres, their facilities, and other sites suitable for a huge range of class activities.
  • Practical guides - designed to help you plan and organise your own class activities in the countryside with helpful advice, suggestions for suitable sites, and equipment loan.
  • Work / activity sheets - covering a range of environment related topics including:
    • Pond and river studies
    • Woodland studies and minibeasts
    • Wayfaring studies and map reading
    • Industrial archaeology
